name: ISC8
tag_list: cyber, security, malware, hackers, intrustion, detection, breach, defense-in-depth, exfiltration, anomolies, forensics, penetration, mitigation, incident, response, data, wiping, wipe, vulnerability, socilal-engineering, wireless, remediation, sox, hippa
description: Expose Cyber Attacks in the Act
overview: ISC8 is actively engaged in the development and sale of Intelligent Cyber Security solutions for information technology (IT) in commercial and government environments worldwide. To provide multiple hardware, software product and services offerings that enable Enterprise Threat Management, it leverages cyber security product platforms, anti-tamper, 3D stacked chip assemblies, high-speed processors, and miniaturized sensors – all technologies it was instrumental in developing.. ISC8 (Irvine Sensors Corporation) was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Costa Mesa, California.

milestones.description: ISC8 Appoints Alissa Valentina Knight as the Company’s New Chief Technology Officer

milestones.description: ISC8 ACQUIRES KEY ASSETS OF BIVIO NETWORKS TO EXPAND INTO "BIG DATA" NETWORK CYBERSECURITY MARKET
